trans-unit.source: Specifies information about the size and visibility of the images and label associated with a Ribbon control.
For more information, see [Ribbon Layout and Resizing](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref> class.
Returns a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref> class.
The new instance of this class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates how to show the image on a control.

A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> control can display a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonImageSize> image, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonImageSize> image, or the image can be <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonImageSize>.
If the control does not specify an image of the size that corresponds to the ImageSize setting, no image is displayed.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
One of the enumeration values that specify how to show the image on a control.
The registered default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonImageSize"></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.ImageSize*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a control is collapsed.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a control is collapsed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.IsCollapsed*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control’s label is visible.
If the label property of the control is not set, no label will be shown even if the IsLabelVisible property is `true`.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control’s label is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.IsLabelVisible*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the maximum width constraint of a container control in a Ribbon.
This property only has an effect if the control is a container for other objects.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The maximum width of the control.
The registered default is <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=fullName>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.MaxWidth*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the minimum width constraint of a container control in a Ribbon.
This property only has an effect if the control is a container for other objects.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The minimum width of the control.
The registered default is 0.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.MinWidth*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the width of a container control in a Ribbon.
This property only has an effect if the control is a container for other objects.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The width of the control.
The registered default is <xref:System.Windows.GridLength.Auto*>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.Width*> dependency property.
To be added.
